intro: Elattostachys microcarpa, commonly known as the small-fruited elattostachys, is a tropical shrub native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. Its fruits are small, dry capsules that contain several seeds. Elattostachys microcarpa is often found in forest understories and is adapted to humid, shaded environments.
